text: Allomorone is an extinct genus of prehistoric bony fish which has not been assigned to any class. Little is known about this fish. == The species == Allomorone includes the following species: * Allomorone burlesonis (Dante & Frizzel, 1965) - Texas, Late Eocene * Allomorone varians (Polkowsky, 1994) - Germany, Chattian/Late Oligocene == Related pages == * Asialepidotus * Allothrissops * List of prehistoric bony fish genera * Palaeonisciformes == References == * paleodb Category:Extinct fish
title: Allomorone
